Player History
Drafted in 45th round, 720th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Injured on 6/18/2015 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 2/13/2021.
Injured on 8/8/2021 with a Bruised Heel, out for 6 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/6/2021, off Robert Schuler (COL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2022, off Tyrone Scheetz (BRO)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/19/2022, hitting .440 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
